multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is a library in Python?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: A file of code written by others that can be used in your own programs
A collection of data that can be accessed by your programs
A type of data structure that can be used to store data
A function that can be called from your programs
